location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1440: Charles Norris, Acting Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, to Major David Wilson, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Charles Norris, Acting Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, writes that he is directed by the Governor in Council of Bombay, Sir John Malcolm, to request that David Wilson, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, obtain a cask, or a few bags, of shining sand from the region, which may be substituted in the Stationery Department for the sand sent from England.
